tweet: Welcome Aaron Alsop to the IOTA Foundation   https://t.co/zkyL2KUqTY  #IOTA

#Trinity Desktop beta preparations are in their final stages. Around 500 testers have been testing the #wallet to ensure it is ready for public. Recent efforts have been spent on ironing out any remaining bugs, preparing the deployment environment & final UI refinement. #IOTA  https://t.co/NcqlwO6zV1
If you haven't updated your #IOTA IRI node yet, now's a good time.

#IOTA Hub makes integrating IOTA simple for any kind of service provider. Using Hub, an exchange can be ready to support IOTA in weeks rather than months, just by connecting Hub to their existing trading platform. The Hub will be made available open source on GitHub very shortly.  https://t.co/VkYDzcxZDI
IOTA Foundation Announced the Launch of IOTA Hub #IOTA #TRUSTtheTANGLE    https://t.co/vmwQrhhGVi via @bloktcrypto

While Masked Authentication Messaging #MAM will be used to encrypt messages sent over the #Tangle, it cannot be used to exchange tokens. The mixer is the first application aiming to improve the anonymity and fungibility of #IOTA. #privacy  https://t.co/wn08GEYLSt
